task.summary: Default task
Added minimal distance function for projecting a dragged point onto line segment
Re-implemented the dragged point function in Scatterplot.js to use minimum distance function
Changed the animation and started to change the appending of the hint path
Added multiple chained transitions to animate the points when a hint path label is clicked on the scatterplot
Changed the animatePoints function to handle reverse animations, but it is still pretty buggy
Starting to implement the ambiguous case detection for scatterplot
Detecting ambiguous points in the scatterplot and tagging them by type
Trying to identify and separate different groups of stationary points, putting the points in separate arrays
Created small data subsets for drawing interaction loops to facilitate interaction with stationary points on the scatterplot
Drawing dashed loops to show stationary points on scatterplot
Changed label positioning for revisiting points on scatterplot
Drawing labels along interaction loop for stationary points
Fixed problem with snapping to views: dragend event has undefined mouse coordinates resulting in a null distance calculation
Small changes to the slider, specifically fixed the same dragend bug and added some comments
For the scatterplot: fixed the axis colouring problem, repositioned the title
Starting to clean up the bar chart code
Changed the animation effect on the barchart to use the d3 interpolate function
Changed the animation and drawing of the hint path
Starting to detect ambiguous cases in the barchart (stationary is done)
Drawing interaction paths on top of the hint path for sequences of stationary bars on the barchart
Removed some repetition of the d3 svg line generator function in the barchart
Fixed up some of the dataset files, tried to fix the problem with scatterplot points being drawn off the axis
Fixed axis problem in scatterplot, need to set min to 0
Animating the bars and hint path when a hint label is clicked, for the barchart
Changed method for detecting ambiguous points and merged revisiting and stationary points into the same data structure
Added clicking to the background SVG as a way for clearing the hint path (however, this event is interfering with the drag event)
Changed the rendering order of the barchart such that the hint path is always drawn last
Same rendering order change to the scatterplot
Fixed some bugs in the piechart code
Refactored the hint path code for piechart, but hint path is no longer drawing properly
Made SVG clickable to clear hint path for piechart
Added label colouring toggling for revisiting points in scatterplot
Attempting to implement the dragging along loop interaction for scatterplot
Refactoring the piechart code, adding some missing features (e.g., slider and functions) which are not fully programmed yet. Altered the piechart datasets to be consistent with the required format
Refactoring the heatmap code, added axis labels + title and created a new colour generator
Fixed the hint path gradient for the heatmap
Added fast forwarding to the heatmap by clicking label on hint path
Adding translation to the hint path of the heatmap
Starting to program the interaction across stationary bar sequences on barchart
Fixed problem of going out of bounds when dragging cell on heatmap
Translating hint path on heatmap in x and y - not working
Centered the hint path at the dragged cell on heatmap, now hint path directions are more understandable
Added animation to hint path on heatmap, but doesn't move properly according to the motion
Changing the dragging interaction of the loop to follow a circle which approximates the curve in scatterplot ambiguous cases
Implemented animation of the hint path for the piechart
Animating segments while a piechart segment is dragged, not working for segments wrapping around 360
Added animation of the piechart when using the time slider
Fixed sizing problem with barchart (width not set properly)
Fixed a small scaling issue with barchart y-axis
Added some real datasets for barchart and scatterplot (surfnet demo)
Almost fixed the piechart problem of angles wrapping over 360, but still some angles get drawn flipped
Added customizable colour scale for the piechart to easily change the colours
Reduced the start angle of the dragged piechart segment to prevent it from blowing up (over 360)
Implemented piechart animation when hint label is clicked, however the animation effect is strange
Disabled selection on browser to improve touch interaction, made some small changes to the datasets
Fixed translate x for heatmap hint path
Added click function to heatmap svg to clear hint path
Experimenting with ways to animate the heatmap hint path
Fixed id conflict with svg container when multiple visualizations are in one html
Reduced the flickering of the slider by re-setting the interpValue variable of each visualization to 0 each time the view is changed, but it still flckers when the view toggles
Implemented dragging around a circle for navigating across stationary points in a circle, added fading label colour as an effect
New approach to translating the hint path for heatmap (shrinking the boundaries and mapping that interpolation amount to the real hint path coordinates)
Changed the piechart segment dragging by using the angle for bounds checking (instead of the end angle), works a lot better
Removed the flickering problem with the time slider in all except scatterplot (didn't really eliminate the problem, because the views are still toggling)
Got the fast forwarding animation feature working again in the scatterplot
Trying to change the technique for updating the dragged piechart segment to make tracking time differences easier
Added sine waves to the barchart in the ambiguous case
Fixed minor view changing bug in slider, but the visualization is still flickering when the slider is dragged
Changed interaction paths of scatterplot stationary points to loops (instead of circles), implemented dragging along the loops and dragging the point (it will turn to wireframe)
Adding the example file for dragging along a loop
Starting to make a d3 example of dragging along a sine wave (for interaction ambiguity)
Added a different layout for the piechart hint path (each year is on a different radius)
Implementing a separate D3 example of dragging up and down to navigate across a sine wave (for barchart ambiguity), can move forward but not not backward in time
Added animation to the sine wave example
Working on translating the sine wave, still jittering a little but seems to be guessing the correct time direction
Changed the interpolation of the barchart interaction paths
Used interpolation amount difference to set the time direction for sine wave example
Integrated the sine wave dragging code into the barchart
Added an anchor to the barchart hint path to see the dragging amount more clearly
Refactored heatmap code for handling dragging
Added a separate anchor to the scatterplot interaction loops (instead of changing the actual point's display properties)
Implemented dragging around corners of the piechart hint path using the change in angular dragging direction to trigger a view change
Fixed the jerky motion when piechart hint path is animated
Changed the anchor of the barchart to be a line drawn from mouse to position along sine wave
Changed animation of Barchart hint path to use transformations instead of redrawing the path
For each visualization, moved most of the styles into css file
Added time inference to barchart dragging when hint path switches vertical direction and interaction is ambiguous
Fixed the flickering in the visualizations when dragging the slider (needed to re-set the interpolation amount when views are switched)
Interaction paths are drawn on the heatmap but do not have the correct x-position
Changed the method for tracking revolutions in D3 dragging along loop example, but it is still buggy
Added ambiguous case detection to the piechart, but does not draw any paths yet
Added label colour switching to the barchart hint path
Implemented a redraw hint path function for the piechart when snapping to views
Added a tolerance value to y-coordinates of the bars at peaks along the hint paths
Added a tolerance amount at peaks on barchart hint path such that the user does not need to drag all the way to the peak point to change views
Added a form for toggling the type of indicator drawn along the sine wave on the barchart's hint path, this is easier for comparing the different design options
Detecting and drawing interaction paths on the piechart hint path
Added a progress indicator to the barchart hint path which highlights the amount travelled between views when the user is dragging
Changed the method of counting revolutions when dragging along a loop for the scatterplot, is better than the old one but there are still problems when transitioning out of the loop
Added a large progress path indicator to show how much a user has travelled along the hint path of a barchart, this colours the path from start to finish (instead of between views)
Fixed problem when dragging along scatterplot loop, the interpolation value was incorrect
Fixed the flickering problem when bar is at a peak on the hint path and a tolerance height is used
Added label colour opacity transitioning to the scatterplot hint path
Added rounded corners to the piechart hint path
Jumping is a bit better in the barchart, problems occurring when the saved drag direction and current direction are the same. Made the same code fix to the piechart
Changed drawing of the piechart hint path to be points and a spline, still looks jagged
Implemented interaction along sine wave of piechart, but is slightly buggy and anchor does not re-draw in the correct position

Fixed a bug in scatterplot and barchart: when clicking a data object at the last view, the display shifts to the current view (one less than the next view), for only the case of snapping to view, the next view can go out of bounds so the display is not shifted
Detecting the end points of a sine wave because when it forms a peak with the hint path, there is interaction ambiguity.
Fixed jumping when entering the sine wave from the right side of the hint path (moving backwards in time), just needed to ensure the interpolation starts at 1, not 0. Only works for the 'non-peaks'.
Fixed time direction ambiguity when dragging begins in the middle of a sine wave on the barchart (the vertical dragging direction decides the time direction)
Reduced the jumpiness caused by view switching when dragging into a sine wave which forms a peaks with the hint path
Added function to hide the anchor for the sine wave on barchart when it is not being used
Added a threshold for height differences between bars, this way consecutive bars with very close heights are treated as stationary (draw interaction path)

Fixed jumping issues when sine wave is situated at the first or last view along the hint path and these views are encountered during dragging, however it is still jumping at the point when dragging starts from either of these views
Added dragging along sine wave to the piechart, but views are jumping when entering the sine wave travelling backward in time
Fixed the heatmap's hint path horizontal translation and time inference at peaks
Fixed the alignment issues with the sine waves drawn on the Heatmap's hint path
Added label fading effect to the heatmap hint path
Fixed jumping occurring on piechart hint path and sine wave corners
Fixed animation when hint label is clicked on barchart hint path (wrong variable used for counting data objects)
Fixed fast forwarding feature in scatterplot
Fixed fast forwarding in the piechart, using tweening for the animation
Added fast forwarding to piechart, including animating the hint path. Need to smooth out the animation.
Fixed jumping when beginning dragging at a peak on the barchart hint path, by applying the same fix as the piechart
Added dragging along the sine wave to the heatmap hint path
Started another example of dragging around a circle. The mouse angle and angle drawn on the loop now match.
The coordinate system around the loop's centre is now aligned such that the stationary point is at 0 (added to D3 example)
Drawing the anchor around the loop is now precisely aligned with the mouse dragging (in scatterplot)
Smoothed out the animation for the piechart segments when label is clicked, however the first transition is still not smooth
Fixed positioning of the sine wave on heatmap hint path (was offset in y before dragging started)
Fixed bug in snapping to view functions for all prototypes: was not checking specifically for ambiguous data objects
Fixed a bug in scatterplot and barchart:
Made some small aesthetic changes and added a colour scale legend to the heatmap
Fixed the label placement for stationary points on the scatterplot
Starting to create an automated application for running the user evaluation using node js as a server
Set up the nodejs server
Experimenting with drawing partial hint path for the barchart
Added data logging to the server
Added styling to the task bar for running experiments
Changed method of setting the time direction variable in barchart, instead of using interpolation amount, a change in dragging direction is detected and the time direction sign is flipped
Fixed the partial hint path drawing for the barchart (will be used in experiment)
Added timer to the barchart experiment to induce a time limit for completing tasks
Fixed issue in barchart with the time direction not being set correctly when at either end point of the hint path
Started moving functions that can be re-used in the barchart code, into a separate util file
Added some of the util functions to the heatmap and piechart
Adding client and server functions to the user experiment for switching prototypes and switching interaction techniques
Tracking the time and dragging direction in Scatterplot (for data logging purposes) but have not applied this to the loop
Added time direction detection to scatterplot loops
Added toggling between hint path types to barchart (makes it easier for running the experiment)
Added the color brewer plugin for D3
Added a util function to draw a legend of colours (for piechart and heatmap)
Experimenting with multi-touch events on barchart
Added timer to user evaluation application to time each tasks and show an indicator in the last few seconds
Fixed issue with time direction when sine wave is at the last point on the hint path (on heatmap)
Experimenting with multi touch on scatterplot, added small time sliders separate from the hint path, but multi-touch interaction does not work year
Added multi touch function to invoke fast forwarding using a second finger
Added transition to display the interaction sliders and re-position the labels on scatterplot (so the sliders are not visible all the time)

Improved the speed of the barchart on mobile devices by removing the bottlenecks (redrawing the blurred hint path, using touch points where possible and removing the opacity updates), after detecting the type of device
Fixed the problem with heatmap hint path not drawing when all colours along the path are the same, needed to draw the path as a rectangle because blurring wasn't working for a horizontal path
Experimented with using a clipping rectangle to create a partial view of the hint path, but would like to also grey out the clipped portion of the path
Fixed issues in piechart, barchart and heatmap, with time direction being set incorrectly when sine wave was at either end point of the hint path
Made changeView a util function for all prototypes
Fixed issues with drawing the visualization when snapping to the last view (or using the slider to move to the last view)
Added detection for revisiting points on the scatterplot hint path (mainly for label placement)

Changed the piechart hint path animation to have the path disappear when it reaches the center of the chart (when radius is negative), otherwise, the hint path will begin to wrap around to the other half of chart and eventually pour out of the chart.
Some code refactoring to remove redundant selections and fixed holes appearing in piechart when dragging a segment
Added a function to each prototype for calculating the pixel distance from user's coordinates to the target coordinates of the dragged data object (will be logged during user study)
Changed ambiguity detection to a shared function in util file (only for piechart, barchart and heatmap because scatterplot is slightly different)
Added a small grey bar to replace a bar which has a zero height (so it can be draggable)
Added partial hint path (for user study) to the heatmap and scatterplot, doesn't work for the piechart yet
Fixed bug with piechart's time direction not being set accurately when segment is first dragged
Fixed the time direction in barchart and heatmap (not set properly, which is needed for data logging)
Added the small multiples technique condition to user evaluation, the small multiples will be displayed as an image over the main svg (easier to control spacing)
Added another version of the time slider for the user study that appears more like a video time slider (will allow for more precision when selecting an instant in time)
Added a small multiples display where each image can be clicked
Fixed the clicking problem with the small multiples vis
Changed the appearance of the partial hint path and added ticks to indicate existing heights for barchart
Found a way to hide the cursor in the browser (when using touch monitor)
Added some warm up tasks for the user study using a fake data set
Added intermediate screens between each task confirming submission of solution and displaying feedback
Created a set of 20 tasks for one data set, added some more data logging events
Added screens to separate stages of the experiment, added a tutorial showing how to use interaction techniques
Randomized the set of tasks for the barchart experiment
Starting to automate the generation of small multiple images (different bar highlighting for each task)
Fixed some formatting with the small multiples display, added some clicking interaction
Added tutorial pages explaining how to use each interaction technique for the barchart experiment
Added a real dataset for the barchart experiment and more tutorial pages
Added some new datasets for the piechart (uoit student admissions) and the heatmap (network van de bunt dataset)
Made some changes to the barchart experiment, according to previous pilot test results
Started creating a dataset to use for the scatterplot experiment
Added ability to skip a task in the experiment
Added grid lines to the axes
Added dynamic labels to the scatterplot
Reduced the number of objective tasks per phase and corrected some tasks that had mistakes foound during pilot test
Starting to add the scatterplot experiment
Fixed issues with scatterplot in experiment not reloading datasets properly
Fixed issue with scatterplot SM's, points were not being transformed according to padding/spacing values
Added the exploratory period to the scatterplot experiment, integrating the point labels
Testing a new dataset with the scatterplot using polylinear scales
Added a intermediate screen between phases in the user experiment
Fixed the URL redirection bug when switching between phases in the user experiment
Added year labels to small multiples view
Changed the loop display for scatterplot experiment - ambiguous cases
Added missing data logging for scatterplot (time direction changes and pixel distance)
Fixed bug with partial hint path, where the line was sometimes not blurred when moving forward
Detected missing data points in scatterplot and interpolate between surrounding years. The label on the hint path for interpolated years is not shown.
Added some images for distribution multiple object tasks in barchart experiment
Made the tutorials for the dimp and slider technique interactive, such that the participant can practice using the techniques before starting the practice tasks
Added some more tutorial images for the scatterplot experiment and created a full set of practice tasks

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Added some more tutorial images for the scatterplot experiment and created a full set of practice tasks
